title.narrative: MP Higher Education Quality Improvement Project

description.narrative: The development objective of the proposed project is to improve student outcomes especially for disadvantaged groups in selected higher education institutions and to increase the effectiveness of the higher education system in Madhya Pradesh.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Higher Education Madhya Pradesh

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Independent Verification Agent(s) | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall appoint, and thereaftermaintain throughout the Project implementation period, independent verification agent(s), with terms of reference andqualifications satisfactory to the Association, for the purposes of carrying out independent verification of the DisbursementLinked Indicator (DLI) targets.

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Plan | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall, by not later than within oneweek of the Effective Date, prepare and adopt the Project Implementation Plan (PIP), in form and substance satisfactory to theAssociation, and thereafter ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with the PIP as agreed with the Association.

Finance Agreement :Submission of DLI reports | Description :The Recipient shall not later than May 15 and November 15 of each yearduring the Project implementation period, as part of the Project Reports, furnish reports to the Association on the status ofachievement of the relevant DLI targets and the DLI verification reports of the independent agent(s).

title.narrative: Govt HEIs publishing an annual report in prescribed format (DLI)
Financial support to disadvantaged students in any HEI in MP (DLI)
Transition rate of UG students from first to second year in supported HEIs (DLI) (disaggregated by disadvantaged groups)
Government Institutions providing complete AISHE data
On-time graduation rates of UG students at supported institutions (disaggregated by relevant categories)
Full-time Staff in the Project Directorate
Faculty in position in Govt HEIs according to norms in Government HEIs (DLI)
Student and Faculty Satisfaction Surveys in supported HEIs
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning
Supported Govt HEIs Satisfaction scores of beneficiaries: percentage at least satisfied (disaggregated by relevant categories)
Governance Benchmarking done by HEIs and findings disseminated
Students benefiting from direct interventions to enhance learning - Female
